TopicTitle: KSP freezes and Crashes on "Loading..."-Screen on startup.

Articles.Content:
So, since recently, when i try to boot up my game, it just starts load normally, but after the normal loading screens, it gets stuck on a blackscreen with the little spinny planets in the bottom right, freezes and stops responding. I also have 2 B9PS serious warnings, but i dont think they are related since ive had them for longer than the crashes are appearing, and just ignored them. i first suspected it was an issue of too many mods, so i removed a few (i know the 240 i have installed now are still quite much, but i have succesfully run installs with 300+ mods since i have quite a beefy machine, so it'd really surprise me if its that), but it still keeps happening.

Logs: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1FWEGS5N6zY2blcs5KutUP50foZUr74zi?usp=sharing

Thanks for any help in advance
